languages.text: "Теперь, когда мы разобрались с расстановкой и основами игры, можно будет переходить к изучению дебютов... но уже в следующий раз. Благодарю за твое время и внимание, {name}".
"Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Теперь, когда мы разобрались с расстановкой и основами игры, можно будет переходить к изучению дебютов... но уже в следующий раз. Благодарю за твое время и внимание, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to studies... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."
"Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to studies... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."
"Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."
"Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."
"Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

languages.text: 「これでプレイの準備は整ったから、オープニングに進むことができる…ではまた次回。貴重な時間をありがとう、{name}さん」
languages.original_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「これでプレイの準備は整ったから、オープニングに進むことができる…ではまた次回。貴重な時間をありがとう、{name}さん」

languages.text: “既然咱们已经了解了棋子与基本规则，就可以谈谈该如何开局了……不过，这些等到下次再说吧。感谢你的时间与兴趣，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “既然咱们已经了解了棋子与基本规则，就可以谈谈该如何开局了……不过，这些等到下次再说吧。感谢你的时间与兴趣，{name}。”

languages.text: « Maintenant que nous avons vu la configuration du plateau et les règles de base, nous allons pouvoir nous pencher sur les ouvertures... la prochaine fois. Merci de m'avoir accordé votre temps et votre attention, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que nous avons vu la configuration du plateau et les règles de base, nous allons pouvoir nous pencher sur les ouvertures... la prochaine fois. Merci de m'avoir accordé votre temps et votre attention, {name}. »

languages.text: «Ahora que hemos estudiado la colocación de las piezas y los conceptos básicos, podemos pasar a los movimientos iniciales... la próxima vez. Gracias por su tiempo y atención, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que hemos estudiado la colocación de las piezas y los conceptos básicos, podemos pasar a los movimientos iniciales... la próxima vez. Gracias por su tiempo y atención, {name}».

languages.text: "Da wir das Spielbrett und die Grundregeln besprochen haben, geht es nun um die Eröffnungen ... beim nächsten Mal. Danke für Eure Zeit und Aufmerksamkeit, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Da wir das Spielbrett und die Grundregeln besprochen haben, geht es nun um die Eröffnungen ... beim nächsten Mal. "Danke für Eure Zeit und Aufmerksamkeit, {name}."

languages.text: "Oyun tahtası kurulumunu ve oyunun temellerini incelediğimize göre artık açıklıklara geçebiliriz. Tabii ki gelecek sefere... Zamanın ve ilgin için teşekkür ederim {name}."
languages.original_text: "Now that we've gone over the board setup and the basics of play, we can move on to openings... next time. Thank you for your time and attention, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Oyun tahtası kurulumunu ve oyunun temellerini incelediğimize göre artık açıklıklara geçebiliriz. Tabii ki gelecek sefere... Zamanın ve ilgin için teşekkür ederim {name}."
